verifiedCustomerID.title: Verified Customer ID
verifiedCustomerID.description: Stores the contact ID associated with the newly created Case.

messagingSessionID.title: Messaging Session ID
messagingSessionID.description: Stores session id from the chat conversation

caseSubject.title: Case Subject
caseSubject.description: Stores the subject of the case to create.

caseDescription.title: Case Description
caseDescription.description: Stores the details of the user issue to be used for the case.
